Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.flow
co.cask.cdap.api.app An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements. 
co.cask.cdap.api.flow Flow implementations. 
co.cask.cdap.internal.flow This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API. 
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.flow used by co.cask.cdap.api.app
Flow
          Flow is a collection of Flowlets that are wired together into a Direct Acylic Graph (DAG).
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.flow used by co.cask.cdap.api.flow
FlowletConnection
          Defines a connection between two Flowlets or from a Stream to a Flowlet.
FlowletConnection.Type
          Defines different types of sources a flowlet can be connected to.
FlowletDefinition
          Class defining the definition for a flowlet.
FlowSpecification
          This class provides the specification of a Flow.
FlowSpecification.Builder.AfterDescription
          Defines a class that represents what needs to happen after a description has been added.
FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectFrom
          Defines the starting flowlet for a connection.
FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo
          Class defining the ConnectTo interface for a connection.
FlowSpecification.Builder.DescriptionSetter
          Defines a class for defining the flow description.
FlowSpecification.Builder.FlowletAdder
          FlowletAdder is responsible for capturing the information of a Flowlet during the specification creation.
FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreConnect
          Interface that defines the building of FlowSpecification.
FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet
          This class allows more flowlets to be defined.
FlowSpecification.Builder.NameSetter
          Class for setting flow name.
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.flow used by co.cask.cdap.internal.flow
FlowletConnection
          Defines a connection between two Flowlets or from a Stream to a Flowlet.
FlowletDefinition
          Class defining the definition for a flowlet.
FlowSpecification
          This class provides the specification of a Flow.
